data.oai_dc:dc: This file contains the R code for generating hypothetical clutches in order to test whether our estimates of paternity skew were significantly different from a null distribution in which males have equal siring probability (accounting for sampling error in the number of offspring and sires). The script also reports P-values and null estimates of skew for each of the females used in this study (excluding the five females that produced offspring from a single sire).
polyandry|microsatellites|dung beetles|paternity skew|post-copulatory sexual selection|micro satellites
